name: FLORES-200
description: FLORES-200 is an evaluation benchmark for low-resource and multilingual machine translation
citeAs: @article{nllb2022, author={NLLB Team, Marta R. Costa-jussà, James Cross, Onur Çelebi, Maha Elbayad, Kenneth Heafield, Kevin Heffernan, Elahe Kalbassi,  Janice Lam, Daniel Licht, Jean Maillard, Anna Sun, Skyler Wang, Guillaume Wenzek, Al Youngblood, Bapi Akula, Loic Barrault, Gabriel Mejia Gonzalez, Prangthip Hansanti, John Hoffman, Semarley Jarrett, Kaushik Ram Sadagopan, Dirk Rowe, Shannon Spruit, Chau Tran, Pierre Andrews, Necip Fazil Ayan, Shruti Bhosale, Sergey Edunov, Angela Fan, Cynthia Gao, Vedanuj Goswami, Francisco Guzmán, Philipp Koehn, Alexandre Mourachko, Christophe Ropers, Safiyyah Saleem, Holger Schwenk, Jeff Wang}, title={No Language Left Behind: Scaling Human-Centered Machine Translation}, year = {2022}}

@inproceedings{flores101, title={The FLORES-101  Evaluation Benchmark for Low-Resource and Multilingual Machine Translation}, author={Goyal, Naman and Gao, Cynthia and Chaudhary, Vishrav and Chen, Peng-Jen and Wenzek, Guillaume and Ju, Da and Krishnan, Sanjana and Ranzato, Marc'Aurelio and Guzm\'{a}n, Francisco and Fan, Angela}, year={2021}}

@inproceedings{twoeval, title={Two New Evaluation Datasets for Low-Resource Machine Translation: Nepali-English and Sinhala-English}, author={Guzm\'{a}n, Francisco and Chen, Peng-Jen and Ott, Myle and Pino, Juan and Lample, Guillaume and Koehn, Philipp and Chaudhary, Vishrav and Ranzato, Marc'Aurelio}, journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:1902.01382}, year={2019}}

distribution.name: tinyurl-repository
distribution.description: Flores 200 is hosted on a webserver.

distribution.name: files-dev
distribution.description: dev files are inside the tar.

distribution.name: metadata-dev
distribution.description: Contains labels for the records in each line in the dev files.

distribution.name: metadata-devtest
distribution.description: Contains labels for the records in each line in the devtest files.

distribution.name: files-devtest
distribution.description: devtest files are inside the tar.

recordSet.name: language_translations_train_data
recordSet.description: Training data for translations to different languages.

field.name: line_number
field.description: The line number for extracted sentences.

field.name: translation
field.description: The translation of the sentence in the target language.

field.name: language
field.description: The language of the sentence translation in ISO 639-3 along with a code for the script used.

recordSet.name: language_translations_train_data_with_metadata
recordSet.description: Training data and metadata for translations to different languages.

field.name: line_number
field.description: The line number for extracted sentences.

field.name: translation
field.description: The translation of the sentence in the target language.

field.name: language
field.description: The language of the sentence translation in ISO 639-3 along with a code for the script used.

field.name: URL
field.description: The URL of the English source of the sentence.

field.name: domain
field.description: The domain of the English source of the sentence.

field.name: topic
field.description: The topic of the sentence.

field.name: has_image
field.description: Whether the source of the sentence has an image.

field.name: has_hyperlink
field.description: Whether the sentence has a hyperlink.

recordSet.name: language_translations_test_data
recordSet.description: Testing data for translations to different languages.

field.name: line_number
field.description: The line number for extracted sentences.

field.name: translation
field.description: The translation of the sentence in the target language.

field.name: language
field.description: The language of the sentence translation in ISO 639-3 along with a code for the script used.

recordSet.description: Testing data and metadata for translations to different languages.
